Plot: Kermit and his new found friends trek across America to find success in Hollywood, but a frog-legs merchant is after Kermit.
Title: The Muppet Movie
Actors: Jim Henson, Frank Oz, Jerry Nelson, Richard Hunt
tomatoConsensus: The Muppet Movie, the big-screen debut of Jim Henson's plush creations, is smart, lighthearted, and fun for all ages.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 3 wins & 9 nominations.
